paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the KCNH2 variant p.Leu839Pro, including clinical significance, patient data, and penetrance.

patients.phenotype: No specific phenotype mentioned for the carrier

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Gene panel sequencing identified that his mother carried a rare variant in KCNH2 encoding p.Leu839Pro human ether-a-go-go (hERG) channels that generate the rapid component of the delayed rectifier current (IKr).

functional_data.summary: The p.L839P hERG variant was never annotated in the Genome Aggregation Database (gnomAD) nor related with BrS.

variants.segregation_data: The variant does not segregate with disease in the family as the proband does not carry it.
variants.additional_notes: The variant was identified in the mother of a proband with BrS, but the proband did not carry the variant.
key_quotes: Gene panel sequencing identified that his mother carried a rare variant in KCNH2 encoding p.Leu839Pro human ether-a-go-go (hERG) channels that generate the rapid component of the delayed rectifier current (IKr).

challenges: Limited information on the KCNH2 variant's functional impact and clinical significance.
extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction focused on the KCNH2 gene, and only one variant was mentioned in the context of a family study.
